Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-12797 affecting package cloud-hypervisor-cvm for versions less than 38.0.72.2-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-12797 affecting package cloud-hypervisor-cvm for versions less than 38.0.72.2-3. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package cloud-hypervisor-cvm is earlier than 38.0.72.2-3, affected by CVE-2024-12797
